column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We had a wonderful time at the Art institute! We spent about 3 hours there Â plus 30 min in the gift shop. There was a bit of a line for tickets so I suggest buying online if you can. Keep in mind we kept a good pace going through the museum but we managed to cover the little rooms
column3: American art and some of the modern art in the modern wing. I think we really got a nice feel for the collections and the museum. It's a really beautiful museum with lots of exceptional collections!
